Content:: Darrel Chandra Raja Collure (3 June 1938 – 7 December 2021) was a Sri Lankan politician who served as Governor of the Uva Province[1][2] and Governor of the North Western Province until his death in 2021.[3] He was a member of the Communist Party of Sri Lanka and a former member of the Sri Lanka Parliament.[4] Collure died from COVID-19 on 7 December 2021, at the age of 83.[3]  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a politician from Uva Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
